Class UCBOptimization

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.optimization.ucbOptimization.UCBOptimization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptimizationObjective

    public class UCBOptimization
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptimizationObjective
    an implementation of optimization objective for any UCBEquation

    AhmedKhalifa

      • UCBOptimization

        public UCBOptimization(java.lang.String[] gamePaths,
                       java.lang.String[] levelPaths,
                       int repetition,
                       int evaluation,
                       UCBEquation ucb)
        Constructor for the current ucb optimization objective
        Parameters:
        gamePaths - all game paths require to test against
        levelPaths - all level paths associated with the games
        repetition - number of repetition to play each game
        evaluation - the maximum number of calls allowed for the evaluation function
        ucb - the current ucb equation to optimize

        public double[] evaluate(double[] parameters)
        evaluate the current parameters against the target objectives
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface OptimizationObjective
        Parameters:
        parameters - the current set of parameters to test
        Returns:
        array of fitness against all objectives (the higher the better), null if you exceed the number of allowed evaluations
